thread.title: Azhar Ali Leaves England Series for Family
thread.title_full: Azhar Ali Leaves England Series for Family

title: Azhar Ali Leaves England Series for Family
text: 18:01 Posted by Asfia Afzal 0 Pakistan’s ODI skipper Azhar Ali is returning back to Pakistan following the death of his mother-in-law and is unlikely to play in the second Test against England starting in Dubai on Thursday. According to local media reports, Team manager Intikhab Alam said, “It’s sad that Ali has to return home following the death of his mother-in-law and his return before the second Test will depend on his visa for the United Arab Emirates”. Azhar Ali missed the first test too due to his injury. Off-spinner Bilal Asif is likely to join the Test squad in place of Azhar Ali. Currently, Asif is in India for his bowling action test in Chennai. Copyright Business Recorder, 2015
